story_25_52000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Did you hear something? I thought I heard some
yelling coming from outside...
story_25_52000/2401_1001_0200_10:
If you’re that concerned, why don’t you turn back
around and go see for yourself? I’m sick of you
following me around!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_0300_10:
No can do. Especially since Rachel and Sawyer
aren’t around to keep an eye on you.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_0400_10: Not to mention, as I’m sure you’ve noticed...
story_25_52000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Team Break’s Pokémon seem to be growing
stronger and stronger as we go.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Fool! It doesn’t matter how strong they are—I’m
more than enough to handle them!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I never needed you in the first place! That goes
for Rachel and Sawyer, too!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_0900_10: Lear! So you finally show your big, ugly mug!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Are you happy now that you’ve trashed
our hideout?!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Well, your fun stops now! The boss got a brawny
new Pokémon, and it’s gonna wreck you!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Heh heh! You better prepare yourselves—
we’re mightier than ever before!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Hmph. Big words from a pipsqueak running on
borrowed power.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_1400_10: You stay out of it! I’ll take this trash out myself!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_1600_10:
That kind of talk’s why you grind my gears, Lear!
But this time, we’re gonna make you grind to
a halt!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_1700_10: Guh! You put up a real fight for a pipsqueak.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Hey, numskulls! How come you didn’t follow
my orders?
story_25_52000/2401_1001_2300_10: B-but we did what you said, boss—
story_25_52000/2401_1001_2400_10:
Can it! Both of you, can it! I only lost ’cause you
two bozos held me back!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Hey, Lear! Next time, it’ll just be you versus me,
and you’ll be goin’ down! Don’t you forget that!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_2600_10:
Hmph! What a pathetic battle. I can’t stand looking
at those losers!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_2700_10: Is that how Team Break’s behavior made you feel?
story_25_52000/2401_1001_2800_10:
Obviously! That guy was strutting around all high
and mighty and couldn’t even face up to the
fact that he lost!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_3000_10: Fair enough. Then you ought to know...
story_25_52000/2401_1001_3100_10: that’s exactly what you look like to everyone else.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_3300_10:
I saw plenty of parallels between you and that
Team Break leader.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_3400_10:
How did you describe him? “Strutting around all
high and mighty and couldn’t even face up to the
fact that he lost”?
story_25_52000/2401_1001_3500_10: I’m afraid that fits you to a tee.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_3600_10:
Shut up! I’m nothing like those vermin. They just
scurry around in packs and get up to no good!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_3700_10: The resemblance doesn’t stop there, I’m afraid.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_3800_10:
You’re also completely oblivious to how those
around you help you out, Lear.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_3900_10: Those around me? What are you talking about?
story_25_52000/2401_1001_4000_10:
Well, look at how the Team Break leader was
yelling at his flunkies.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_4100_10:
But they were actually doing a decent job
supporting him in that battle.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_4200_10:
Perhaps their support was the reason why this
battle was a lot harder than you expected.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_4400_10:
Up until now, you’ve always had Rachel and
Sawyer to help you out when you took on a really
tough opponent.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_4500_10: But they’re not with you now.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_4600_10:
Are you feeling the emptiness where those two
used to stand at your side, Lear?
story_25_52000/2401_1001_4800_10:
You’re wrong! I’ve gotten to where I am by
doing everything myself...
story_25_52000/2401_1001_4900_10: and that’s not about to change now!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_5000_10: I’ll stick with the only partner I can trust—myself!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_5100_10:
And I’ll become the strongest king there is—all
on my own!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_5300_10:
Fine, then let me be blunt. As long as you keep
ignoring those who want to help you...
story_25_52000/2401_1001_5400_10: you’ll never be fit to be a king.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_5700_10:
It’s been a long, long time since anyone dared
insult me so brazenly.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_5800_10:
You and I will battle right here, right now! I’m
going to crush you so completely, you’ll never dare
open that upstart mouth at me again!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_5900_10:
Don’t forget—you’re dealing with the man who
will become the strongest king of all!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_6000_10:
All right, then. I’m dying to see what the “strongest
king of all” is made of.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_6100_10: Let’s go, Stoutland! Let him see our strength!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_6200_10:
Don’t you fail me, Donphan! Put them in
their place!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_6400_10: Looks to me like this battle is finished.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_6700_10: And to you, of all people?!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_6800_10:
Let’s get one thing straight before you go any
further. Your Pokémon isn’t at fault here. Donphan
fought very well.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_6900_10:
Especially for a solitary Pokémon that was going
up against a sync pair.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_7200_10:
There’s a pair of heroes I’ve met who both
earned the recognition of Legendary Pokémon.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_7300_10:
They saw the world very differently, but one
thing they had in common was the strength of
their beliefs.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_7400_10:
One believed firmly in the bonds between
Pokémon and people...
story_25_52000/2401_1001_7500_10:
while the other believed he had to change the
world for Pokémon because they were his friends
and he didn’t want them to get hurt.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_7600_10:
Those firm beliefs earned them the recognition of
the Legendary Pokémon, and the heroes both grew
strong enough to defeat their region’s Champion.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_7700_10:
They also drove back an evil man who sought to
rule over both humans and Pokémon.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_7800_10: Let me tell you something, Lear.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_7900_10: Desperately grasping for power isn’t kingly.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_8000_10:
What you need is a caring spirit—for people and
Pokémon alike.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_8200_10:
I know it might be difficult to see now, but you’ve
got to let go of this fixation on becoming the
strongest one around.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_8300_10:
Once you do, I know you’ll be able to change for
the better. And more than that...
story_25_52000/2401_1001_8900_10:
Hey, listen up! This is Team Break! Can you hear
me, Lear?
story_25_52000/2401_1001_9200_10:
I hope you’re proud of yourself, trampling all over
our hideout!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_9300_10:
Not to mention, our surprise attack was a total
bust. Things aren’t going so great for us.
story_25_52000/2401_1001_9400_10:
So, here’s a little proposal. Why don’t you and I
settle this once and for all?
story_25_52000/2401_1001_9600_10:
I’ve sent a location to your Poryphone. Meet me
there—alone!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_9700_10:
We’re gonna have a Pokémon battle. If you win,
we’ll give Hoopa back to you!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_9800_10:
And if you lose... Heh heh heh! Wouldn’t you just
love to know?
story_25_52000/2401_1001_10000_10:
Do you think we’re going to just waltz into your
exceedingly obvious trap?
story_25_52000/2401_1001_10100_10:
Oho, am I hearing a no? You sure that’s how you
want to play it? Don’t forget—as long as we have
Hoopa, we can do whatever we want...
story_25_52000/2401_1001_10200_10:
I thought you needed the PML to be a success for
you to become the king, Lear! Or do you not
want the crown anymore?
story_25_52000/2401_1001_10700_10: Don’t do this, Lear. You know it’s a trap!
story_25_52000/2401_1001_11200_10:
I’m going to be king! If I can just do that, then
there’ll be no need for me to change!
